name: dad-jokes-gpt
description: Welcome to the Dad Jokes GPT repository! This is a specialized version of ChatGPT, designed to deliver humorous dad jokes with a unique twist. It swiftly presents a joke's text and then creates a related image, visually encapsulating the humor of the joke. Give the live version a try at: [https://chat.openai.com/g/g-xuJ4d3MzM-dad-jokes](https://chat.openai.com/g/g-xuJ4d3MzM-dad-jokes)
